docs.title: Delta
docs.text:
Welcome to the documentation for the Delta package.

Delta is a Django-based project and task management tool designed to help teams and individuals organize, track, and manage their work efficiently.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Kanban board with drag-and-drop task management
  • Task list with advanced filtering and sorting (AG Grid)
  • Customizable workflow statuses
  • User authentication and management
  • Modern, responsive UI with a sidebar and color scheme

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
• See Installation for setup instructions.
  • See Usage for how to use the Kanban features.

docs.title: Modules
docs.text:
• kanban: Core Kanban app (models, views, templates)
  • users: User management

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Python 3.12+
  • Node.js (for frontend dependencies)
  • Django 5.x

docs.title: Steps
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository

    git clone <your-repo-url>
cd delta

  2. Install Python dependencies

    pip install -e .[dev]

  3. Install Node.js dependencies

    npm install

  4. Copy static assets

    python copy_node_to_static.py

  5. Apply migrations

    python manage.py migrate

  6. Create a .env file

    SECRET_KEY=your-secret-key

  7. Set up pre-commit hooks

    This project uses the pre-commit package to ensure code quality by running both black and pylint before any commit. To enable this, run:

    pre-commit install

    Now, every time you commit, black and pylint will automatically check your code.

  8. Run the development server

    python manage.py runserver

  9. Access the app

    Open http://localhost:8000 in your browser.

docs.title: Kanban Module
docs.text: The kanban Django app provides the core functionality for project and task management.

docs.title: Models
docs.text: Bases: Model

docs.title: Views
docs.text:
• kanban_board: Displays the Kanban board with columns for each status.
  • task_list: Shows all tasks in a table.
  • create_task: Form to create a new task.
  • edit_task: Edit an existing task.
  • reorder_tasks: Handles AJAX requests to update task order and status.

docs.title: Templates
docs.text:
• kanban_board.html: Kanban board UI.
  • task_list.html: Task list table.
  • create_task.html: Task creation form.
  • edit_task.html: Task editing form.
  • sidebar.html: Navigation sidebar.

docs.title: Static
docs.text:
• colors.css: Color scheme.
  • JS/CSS for AG Grid, Bootstrap, SortableJS.

docs.title: Users Module
docs.text: The users Django app manages user authentication and user profiles.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Custom user model (extending Django's AbstractUser)
  • Login, logout, and registration views
  • User profile management

docs.title: Models
docs.text: Bases: AbstractUser

docs.title: Templates
docs.text: • Login, logout, registration, and profile templates

docs.title: Kanban Board
docs.text:
• Navigate to the Kanban Board from the sidebar.
  • Drag and drop tasks between columns to update their status and order.
  • Click on a task to edit its details.

docs.title: Task List
docs.text:
• View all tasks in a sortable, filterable table.
  • Click "Edit" to update a task.

docs.title: Creating Tasks
docs.text: • Use the "Create Task" link in the sidebar to add a new task.

docs.title: Sidebar
docs.text: • Use the sidebar to navigate between the homepage, task list, kanban board, and task creation.

docs.title: Customization
docs.text:
• The color scheme can be changed in static/kanban/colors.css.
  • Workflow statuses can be customized in the Task model.
